mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM NUM, board.*, LEVEL-1 LV FROM( SELECT b.ARTICLENO, b.TITLE, b.writer, b.REGDATE, b.RECOMMEND, b.HIT, b.PARENT, b.GRPNO, count(c.ARTICLENO) cmt FROM ( SELECT bb.ARTICLENO, bb.TITLE, bb.REGDATE, bb.RECOMMEND, bb.HIT, bb.PARENT, bb.GRPNO, bb.PUB, m.NAME writer FROM BOARD bb JOIN MEMBER m ON writer = m.id )b LEFT JOIN COMMENT_BOARD c ON b.ARTICLENO = c.ARTICLENO WHERE ${field} LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%' AND PUB = 1 GROUP BY b.ARTICLENO, b.TITLE, b.writer, b.REGDATE, b.RECOMMEND, b.HIT, b.PARENT, b.GRPNO )board START WITH board.PARENT = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR board.ARTICLENO = board.PARENT ORDER SIBLINGS BY GRPNO DESC ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
